description: Crisp pastry with a gooey, sweet apple and strawberry filling, these easy mini pies make a perfect treat to serve at your next celebration.
name: Apple & Strawberry Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top pies with pastry discs, lightly pressing edges with a fork to seal. Brush tops with egg. Sprinkle over remaining sugar. Using a small sharp knife, cut a small cross in tops of each pie. Place in freezer and freeze for 15 minutes. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Stand for 5 minutes. Serve.
